name: Kinetic Storm (Prototype)
description:
Defeat waves of enemies in this action-packed twin stick shooter. After every wave upgrade your ship to customize your build.

This is a prototype, a lot of development is still to come:

  • Different enemy types (and bosses)
  • Choose your primary and secondary weapon
  • More movement and defense skills
  • Many many more upgrades
  • Improved graphics and 3d models
  • Better quality language translations
